TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeLibConverter extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibConverter
Public NotInheritable Class TypeLibConverter Implements ITypeLibConverter

summary.span: 提供一组服务，这些服务将托管程序集转换为 COM 类型库或进行反向转换。

span.span: Provides a set of services that convert a managed assembly to a COM type library and vice versa.

summary.span: 将 COM 类型库转换为程序集。

span.span: Converts a COM type library to an assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder ConvertTypeLibToAssembly (object typeLib, string asmFileName, int flags, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibImporterNotifySink notifySink, byte[] publicKey, System.Reflection.StrongNameKeyPair keyPair, bool unsafeInterfaces);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder ConvertTypeLibToAssembly(object typeLib, string asmFileName, int32 flags, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibImporterNotifySink notifySink, unsigned int8[] publicKey, class System.Reflection.StrongNameKeyPair keyPair, bool unsafeInterfaces) cil managed

Public Function ConvertTypeLibToAssembly (typeLib As Object, asmFileName As String, flags As Integer, notifySink As ITypeLibImporterNotifySink, publicKey As Byte(), keyPair As StrongNameKeyPair, unsafeInterfaces As Boolean) As AssemblyBuilder

public: virtual System::Reflection::Emit::AssemblyBuilder ^ ConvertTypeLibToAssembly(System::Object ^ typeLib, System::String ^ asmFileName, int flags, System::Runtime::InteropServices::ITypeLibImporterNotifySink ^ notifySink, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ publicKey, System::Reflection::StrongNameKeyPair ^ keyPair, bool unsafeInterfaces);

param.name: typeLib
param.span: 实现 接口的对象。

span.span: The object that implements the interface.

param.name: asmFileName
param.span: 产生的程序集的文件名。

span.span: The file name of the resulting assembly.

param.name: flags
param.span: 指示任何特殊设置的 值。

span.span: A value indicating any special settings.

param.name: notifySink
param.span: 由调用方实现的 接口。

span.span: interface implemented by the caller.

param.name: publicKey
param.span: 包含公钥的 数组。

span.span: A array containing the public key.

param.name: keyPair
param.span: 包含公钥和私钥对的 对象。

span.span: A object containing the public and private cryptographic key pair.

param.name: unsafeInterfaces
param.span: 如果为 ，则接口要求在链接时检查 权限。

span.span: If , the interfaces require link time checks for permission.

param.span: 如果为 ，则接口要求在运行时检查，运行时检查需要堆栈审核且更加昂贵，但有助于提供更好的保护。

span.span: If , the interfaces require run time checks that require a stack walk and are more expensive, but help provide greater protection.

summary.span: 将 COM 类型库转换为程序集。

span.span: Converts a COM type library to an assembly.

returns.span: 包含已转换的类型库的 对象。

span.span: An object containing the converted type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不希望生成你的程序集的强名称，它可用于`publicKey`和`keyPair`要`null`，只要`flags`不等于。If you do not want to generate a strong name for your assembly, it is valid for `publicKey` and `keyPair` to be `null`, as long as `flags` does not equal . 否则，必须指定至少其中一个参数。Otherwise, at least one of these parameters must be specified. 如果`publicKey`是`null`中的公钥`keyPair`将在目标程序集清单的元数据中设置，并且将基于程序集的内容生成一个签名。If `publicKey` is `null`, the public key in `keyPair` will be set in the target assembly's manifest metadata and a signature will be generated based on the contents of the assembly. 如果`keyPair`是`null`，`publicKey`将在目标程序集清单的元数据中设置，并且将生成未签名。If `keyPair` is `null`, `publicKey` will be set in the target assembly's manifest metadata and no signature will be generated. 指定这两个参数不是通常很有用，并且可能会导致无效的签名中。Specifying both parameters is not generally useful, and can result in an invalid signature. 有关详细信息`ITypeLib`，请参阅 MSDN 库中的其现有文档。For more information on `ITypeLib`, please see its existing documentation in the MSDN library.

-or- is .
-or- is .
is an empty string.

exception.span: - 或 - 超过系统定义的最大长度。

span.span: -or- is longer than the system-defined maximum length.
For more information, see .
is not .
-or- and are .

exception.span: 产生的元数据存在错误，阻止加载任何类型。

span.span: The metadata produced has errors preventing any types from loading.

permission.span: 表示调用非托管的代码的权限。

span.span: for permission to call unmanaged code.
Security Action: Demand.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不希望生成你的程序集的强名称，它可用于`publicKey`和`keyPair`要`null`，只要`flags`不等于。If you do not want to generate a strong name for your assembly, it is valid for `publicKey` and `keyPair` to be `null`, as long as `flags` does not equal . 否则，必须指定至少其中一个参数。Otherwise, atleast one of these parameters must be specified. 如果`publicKey`是`null`中的公钥`keyPair`将在目标程序集清单的元数据中设置，并且将基于程序集的内容生成一个签名。If `publicKey` is `null`, the public key in `keyPair` will be set in the target assembly's manifest metadata and a signature will be generated based on the contents of the assembly. 如果`keyPair`是`null`，`publicKey`将在目标程序集清单的元数据中设置，并且将生成未签名。If `keyPair` is `null`, `publicKey` will be set in the target assembly's manifest metadata and no signature will be generated. 指定这两个参数不是通常很有用，并且可能会导致无效的签名中。Specifying both parameters is not generally useful, and can result in an invalid signature. 有关详细信息`ITypeLib`，请参阅 MSDN 库中的其现有文档。For more information on `ITypeLib`, please see its existing documentation in the MSDN library. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ConvertTypelibToASSembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.ConvertTypelibToASSembly/CPP/convert1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ConvertTypelibToASSembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.ConvertTypelibToASSembly/CS/convert1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ConvertTypelibToASSembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.ConvertTypelibToASSembly/VB/convert1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly (Guid g, int major, int minor, int lcid, out string asmName, out string asmCodeBase);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly(valuetype System.Guid g, int32 major, int32 minor, int32 lcid, [out] string& asmName, [out] string& asmCodeBase) cil managed
Public Function GetPrimaryInteropAssembly (g As Guid, major As Integer, minor As Integer, lcid As Integer, ByRef asmName As String, ByRef asmCodeBase As String) As Boolean

public: virtual bool GetPrimaryInteropAssembly(Guid g, int major, int minor, int lcid, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % asmName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % asmCodeBase);

param.name: g
param.span: 类型库的 GUID。

span.span: The GUID of the type library.

param.name: major
param.span: 类型库的主版本号。

span.span: The major version number of the type library.

param.name: minor
param.span: 类型库的次版本号。

span.span: The minor version number of the type library.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 类型库的 LCID。

span.span: The LCID of the type library.

param.name: asmName
param.span: 成功返回时，为与 g 相关联的主互操作程序集的名称。

span.span: On successful return, the name of the primary interop assembly associated with g.

param.name: asmCodeBase
param.span: 成功返回时，为与 g 相关联的主互操作程序集的基本代码。

span.span: On successful return, the code base of the primary interop assembly associated with g.

summary.span: 获取指定类型库的主互操作程序集的名称和基本代码。

span.span: Gets the name and code base of a primary interop assembly for a specified type library.

returns.span: 如果在注册表找到主互操作程序集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the primary interop assembly was found in the registry; otherwise .
